item.title: How I Ended Up Choosing the Ford Kuga Over the RAV4 in Romania â€” And Why It Was the Best Value SUV
item.description: After 160+ hours of research and years of trusting only Japanese brands, I unexpectedly chose an American SUV: the Ford Kuga. Here’s how it outclassed the competition, including the beloved Toyota RAV4, in the Romanian market.
